cardControl.description: Card control settings for debit cards

alertPreferencesEnabled.description: Whether alert preferences are enabled in Card Control

userDeviceSetupEnabled.description: Whether user device setup is enabled in Card Control

managePermissionsEnabled.description: Whether manage permissions is enabled in Card Control

useDynamicTransactionTypes.description: Whether to use dynamic transaction types

internetTransactionControlEnabled.description: Whether internet transaction control is enabled

largeTransactionControlEnabled.description: Whether large transaction control is enabled

timeOfDayRangeControlEnabled.description: Whether time of day range control is enabled

cardOffUserDefinedTimeEnabled.description: Whether user-defined card off time is enabled

internationalTransactionControlEnabled.description: Whether international transaction control is enabled

merchantStateListControlEnabled.description: Whether merchant state list control is enabled

expirationSettings.description: Expiration date settings for debit cards

changeExpirationToEndOfPreviousMonth.description: Whether to change expiration date to end of previous month

expiresAtStartOfMonth.description: Whether cards expire at start of month
